newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Seoul bourse halts trading in Hwan Yung.
newsitem.headline: Seoul bourse halts trading in Hwan Yung.

text.p: The Korea Stock Exchange ordered a suspension in trading Hwan Yung Industry Co Ltd shares for Monday's afternoon session, a bourse statement said.
Pusan District Court on Saturday ordered the company to liquidate. The company informed the exchange of the court order on Monday.
Hwan Yung told the exchange it would file an application on how the company would be liquidated by the end of this year.
The company defaulted on debts in December 1996 on mounting competition and financial costs.
Hwan Yung's share price stood at 2,000 won before the trading suspension, which is far lower than its par value of 5,000 won.
